name: Robobreak
description:
A game where the only way to progress is by breaking your robotic parts.

Controls:

a,d - left and right

w, space - jump

Special thanks to:

@joshuaempyre from freesound.org for the main music. https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/251461/

This game was created in 3 day for the Wowie game jam 3.0
